cards.title: Soulbinder
body: Conduit Surge
powers: One of your Targets deals 1 Target 3 Infernal Damage and themselves 1 Infernal Damage.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

openingLines.default: This place's aura is unique. I won't have you disturbing it.

cards.title: Wooden Soulsplinter
powers: Each of your targets regains 1 HP.

cards.title: Straw Soulsplinter
powers: One of your Targets deals 1 Target 2 Toxic Damage and regains 2 HP.

cards.title: Ritual of Catastrophe
body: When this card enters play, place 3 Ritual Tokens on it.
When the last token is removed from this, destroy up to 2 other Ongoing or Environment cards, each non-Hero target deals itself 3 Irreducible Infernal Damage, and destroy this card.
powers: Remove 1 Ritual Token from this. If you have a Soulsplinter in play, remove 1 Ritual Token from this.

cards.title: Ritual of Salvation
body: When this card enters play, place 3 Ritual Tokens on it.
When the last token is removed from this, each Hero target regains 3 HP and each player draws a card. Then, destroy this card.
powers: Remove 1 Ritual Token from this. If you have a Soulsplinter in play, remove 1 Ritual Token from this.

cards.title: Ritual of Transferrence
body: When this card enters play, place 3 Ritual Tokens on it.
When the last token is removed from this, up to 3 Targets regain 2 HP and 1 Target deals itself Toxic damage equal to the total HP regained this way. Then, destroy this card.
powers: Remove 1 Ritual Token from this. If you have a Soulsplinter in play, remove 1 Ritual Token from this.

cards.title: Ritual of Knowledge
body: When this card enters play, place 3 Ritual Tokens on it.
When the last token is removed from this, you may draw 4 cards, play a card, and use a power. Then, destroy this card.
powers: Remove 1 Ritual Token from this. If you have a Soulsplinter in play, remove 1 Ritual Token from this.

cards.title: Ritual Components
body: At the end of your turn, remove 1 Ritual Token from 1 of your Ritual Cards.
powers: One of your targets deals 1 Target 2 Infernal Damage. Remove 1 Ritual Token from 1 of your Ritual Cards.

cards.title: Arcane Detonation
body: You may play a Ritual or Soulsplinter.
One of your targets deals each non-Hero target and themselves 2 Infernal Damage.

cards.title: Sacrificial Rite
body: You may play a Ritual or Soulsplinter.
One of your targets deals 1 target and themselves 2 Infernal Damage.
Remove 1 Ritual Token from each of your Rituals.

cards.title: Keystone of Spirit
body: You may play a Ritual or Soulsplinter.
One of your targets deals 1 themselves 1 Infernal Damage.
Each other Hero Target regains 1 HP.
You may use a power now.

cards.title: Final Eruption
body: You may play a Ritual or Soulsplinter.
Select 1 of your non-Character Targets. It deals 1 Target Infernal Damage equal to its current HP plus 2.
Then, destroy the selected target.

cards.title: Debt of the Soulless
body: The first time a Hero Target would deal one of your Targets damage each turn, you may reduce that damage by 1 and draw a card.

cards.title: Spiritual Resonance
body: Select Ritual or Soulsplinter.
Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal a card of the selected type. Play that card. Shuffle the other revealed cards into your deck.
One of your Targets deals themselves 1 Infernal Damage.
You may draw 2 cards.

dummyCards.title: Repeated Rites
body: When one of your Rituals would be destroyed, you may instead add 2 Ritual Tokens to it and destroy this card.

dummyCards.title: Reliquary
body: When this card enters play, you may put a card from under your Instructions card into play.
When one of your characters would be destroyed, you may instead restore it to 6 HP and destroy this card.

promoCards.title: Soulbinder
powers: Draw 1 card. Remove 1 Ritual Token from a Ritual.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
